title: New: TULA – Another Kind of Red
body:
Was a huge fan of River, a single released last year by Swedish singer **Tula**, and her latest offering, _Another Kind of Red_ doesn’t disappoint.

With another two singles expected later in the year, also produced by Klas Ahlund, it’s hugely ambitious sounding pop songwriting that deserves to reach a large audience. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
